metadataTip.title: Metadata Tip
metadataTip.content: After adding the dataset, click the Edit Dataset button to add more metadata.

validationAlert.title: Validation Error
validationAlert.content: Required fields were missed or there was a validation error. Please scroll down to see details.

title.label: Title
title.tooltip: The main title of the Dataset

authorName.label: Author Name
authorName.tooltip: The name of the author, such as the person's name or the name of an organization

datasetContactEmail.label: Point of Contact E-mail
datasetContactEmail.tooltip: The point of contact's e-mail address
datasetContactEmail.feedback: Point of Contact E-mail is required.

dsDescriptionValue.label: Description Text
dsDescriptionValue.tooltip: A summary describing the purpose, nature and scope of the Dataset

subject.label: Subject
subject.tooltip: The area of study relevant to the Dataset
